alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 6:28PM CDT until August 04 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Collingsworth County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Donley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lelia Lake, or 9 miles east of Clarendon, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Clarendon, Howardwick, Hedley, Lelia Lake and Greenbelt Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
